tags.name: lrnsys-button
tags.description:
`lrnsys-button`
`A simple button for use in systems`

Attributes:

  * `raised` {`boolean`} - If the button should be visually lifted off the UI.

  * `hover-class` {`string`} - Classes to add / subtract based on the item being hovered.

  * `inner-class` {`string`} - Inner container classes.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - dark state.

  * `href` {`string`} - Standard href pass down

  * `target` {`string`} - Support for target to open in new windows.

  * `label` {`string`} - Label to place in the text area

  * `icon` {`string`} - simple-icon to use (with iconset if needed)

  * `alt` {`string`} - Alt via tooltip.

  * `icon-class` {`string`} - Icon class in the event you want it to look different from the text.

  * `button-class` {`string`} - Button class.

  * `color` {`string`} - Color class work to apply

  * `text-color` {`string`} - materializeCSS color class for text

  * `focus-state` {`boolean`} - Tracks if focus state is applied

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Disabled state.

Properties:

  * `raised` {`boolean`} - If the button should be visually lifted off the UI.

  * `hoverClass` {`string`} - Classes to add / subtract based on the item being hovered.

  * `innerClass` {`string`} - Inner container classes.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - dark state.

  * `href` {`string`} - Standard href pass down

  * `target` {`string`} - Support for target to open in new windows.

  * `label` {`string`} - Label to place in the text area

  * `icon` {`string`} - simple-icon to use (with iconset if needed)

  * `alt` {`string`} - Alt via tooltip.

  * `iconClass` {`string`} - Icon class in the event you want it to look different from the text.

  * `buttonClass` {`string`} - Button class.

  * `color` {`string`} - Color class work to apply

  * `textColor` {`string`} - materializeCSS color class for text

  * `focusState` {`boolean`} - Tracks if focus state is applied

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Disabled state.
